Welcome to Lang Eugen's Digital Space

Explore a portfolio showcasing Lang's expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular front-end frameworks like React and Vue. From responsive designs that adapt seamlessly to any device to interactive elements that engage users, Lang's work reflects a commitment to excellence and innovation.

Whether you're seeking a modern website for your business, an engaging web application, or advice on front-end development best practices, Lang Eugen is your trusted partner. Join the digital revolution and elevate your online presence with Lang Eugen's expertise.

Technologies

HTML5

HTML5 serves as the foundation for structuring and presenting content on the web, offering enhanced semantics, multimedia support, and interactive elements.

Learn more

CSS3

CSS3 plays a crucial role in styling and designing web pages, providing advanced layout options, animations, and responsive design capabilities for improved user interfaces.

Learn more

JavaScript

JavaScript is essential for adding dynamic functionality to web applications, enabling DOM manipulation, event handling, and asynchronous communication with servers.

Learn more

React

React is a JavaScript library for building fast and interactive user interfaces, using a component-based architecture and a virtual DOM for efficient rendering.

Learn more

Redux

Redux is a predictable state container for JavaScript apps, often used with React for managing application state in a centralized and scalable way.

Learn more

React Native

React Native is utilized for developing cross-platform mobile applications using JavaScript and React, enabling efficient code sharing and native app experiences on iOS and Android.

Learn more

Vue

Vue is a progressive JavaScript framework for building user interfaces. It features a declarative and component-based programming model that is simple to integrate and scale.

Learn more

Nuxt 2 / Nuxt 3

Nuxt is a powerful framework built on Vue.js, used for creating modern and high-performance server-side rendered (SSR) and static websites with streamlined development workflows.

Learn more

Vuetify

Vuetify is a comprehensive UI library for Vue.js projects, offering pre-designed components, themes, and responsive design features to enhance user interfaces.

Learn more

Node.js

Node.js is a runtime environment that allows JavaScript to be run on the server side, enabling the development of scalable and high-performance web applications.

Learn more

WordPress

WordPress serves as a versatile platform for creating dynamic websites and blogs, providing customizable themes, plugins, and content management tools for easy publishing and management.

Learn more

GitHub

GitHub plays a pivotal role in code collaboration and version control, facilitating efficient code management, collaboration among developers, and project tracking.

Learn more

Vuex/Pinia

Vuex and Pinia are state management libraries for Vue.js, offering centralized state management, data sharing, and reactive updates to streamline application development and maintain data consistency.

Learn more

AWS

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a comprehensive cloud platform that provides a wide range of services including computing power, storage, databases, and machine learning. It enables scalable, secure, and cost-effective solutions for deploying and managing applications.

Learn more

Leaflet

Leaflet is a lightweight, open-source JavaScript library for interactive maps, widely used for embedding customizable maps into web applications.

Learn more

Mapbox

Mapbox is a flexible mapping platform that enables developers to create custom maps and geolocation experiences. It offers advanced styling, real-time data visualization, and seamless integration with web and mobile applications.

Learn more
